org.ensor.math.analysis

Class LinearFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ensor.math.analysis.LinearFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDifferentiable, IDifferentiableFunction, IFunction

    public class LinearFunction
extends Object
implements IDifferentiableFunction
    This class implements a linear function.
    Author:
    jona

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LinearFunction(double aStart, double aDelta)
      The constructor creates a linear interpolator which runs from the start to the end point.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConstantFunction getDerivative()
      This method returns the first derivative of the linear function.
      double getValue(double t)
      This method returns the point value for the specified path parameter.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LinearFunction

        public LinearFunction(double aStart,
              double aDelta)
        The constructor creates a linear interpolator which runs from the start to the end point.
        Parameters:
        aStart - Start point of the interpolation for t=0.
        aDelta - Slope of the line.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        public double getValue(double t)
        This method returns the point value for the specified path parameter. The path parameter runs from 0 to 1.
        Specified by:
        getValue in interface IFunction
        Parameters:
        t - Path parameter.
        Returns:
        The point between start and end of path corresponding to this path location.

      • getDerivative

        public ConstantFunction getDerivative()
        This method returns the first derivative of the linear function. This is always a constant function which represents the slope of the line.
        Specified by:
        getDerivative in interface IDifferentiable
        Returns:
        The (constant) differentiable function which is the slope of this linear function.
